question: Which Indian state/UT has launched 'Abhayam' app for safety of women passengers?
explanation:
Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh Y.S. Jagan Mohan Reddy has recently launched 'Abhayam' mobile phone application.
The app has bene launched with an aim to help women and children to raise alarm in case of any emergency, while travelling in taxis and auto-rickshaws. As a pilot project, as many as 1000 auto-rickshaws fitted with Internet-of -Things (IoT)-enabled GPS devices will be launched.
